law.catch_line: Consent to tests for alcohol concentration or substance which may impair driving ability -- Test procedures -- Who may administer -- Personal testing.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 214, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 467, sec. 8, effective October 1, 2000. -- Created 1991 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 15, sec. 6, effective July 1, 1991.
